articles.title: Exclusive | Prajakta Koli Recalls 'JugJugg Jeeyo' Shoot Days. Says, 'Neetu Kapoor Is The Cutest' - ABP Live
articles.description: In a candid conversation with ABP Live, Prajakta talked about her experience in her previous film 'Jug Jug Jeeyo' where she got the opportunity to work with veterans like Neetu Kapoor and Anil Kapoor.
